General Description
Conveniently located off M1 Motorway, Days Inn Watford Gap hotel is the perfect place to get away from it all Our Northampton hotel near Althorp Country House makes it easy to get to the most popular attractions in the area Pull off the road and park your car, truck or bus in our free parking lot Handicapped-accessible and non-smoking rooms are available and kids 17 and under stay free with an adult at our pet-friendly hotel Local Attractions Take the short drive from our Northampton hotel to Althorp Country House, the final resting place of Lady Diana Spencer, where exhibitions honour her memory and stunning gardens offer a quiet place to reflect and enjoy the beautiful grounds Experience the thrill of world class motorsport events at Silverstone Circuit, which features motorcycle, performance car and touring car racing at the highest levels Our hotel is eight miles from Northampton Town Centre, where you can shop at Grosvenor Centre If you love sports, catch a game at Sixfields Stadium, home of Northampton Town Football Club Our hotel is three miles from Long Buckby Train Station Dining Options You do not need to leave our hotel in Northampton to enjoy a great meal Grab a bite to eat at Costa Coffee or sit down to dinner at Restbite Restaurant, on-site at our hotel If you are craving Thai cuisine, head to Mango Lounge, walking distance from our hotel Roadchef features a variety of dining options, so swing by and get something for the road Village Garden is less than two miles from our Northampton hotel and serves authentic Indian dishes
